p: Acarbose, a known pharmacological inhibitor of α-glucosidase and pancreatic α-amylase was used as the positive control in the α-glucosidase and α-amylase assays [ 45, 67, 91]. Orlistat, a known inhibitor of pancreatic lipase was used as the positive control in the lipase assay [ 92, 93]. Acarbose (Cat. No. ACR459080010), and orlistat (Cat. No. O4139) were purchased from Thermo Fisher Scientific Australia and Sigma-Aldrich, respectively.
